title: Why take out normal Free rotation 5 days earlyyyyyy

replies.body: Because the oceanic week rotation will be replacing the normal rotation for this week.

> [{quoted}](name=Katsprky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k3ATZfJi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-22T20:36:12.198+0000)
>
> Because the oceanic week rotation will be replacing the normal rotation for this week.

It was the only free week I've liked in a while and they only give it to us for two days? without notice either? :/

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k3ATZfJi,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T05:40:24.642+0000)
>
> What rock have you been hiding under??? There was notice, 4/5 days ago Riot announced Ocean Week. Maybe if you actually checked anything (like the announcements both in the patcher and in-client and the news section of the website) you might have known about it. And chances are, when Ocean Week finishes, the free rotation that was cut short will be back, as has always been the case with such situations.

Oh. Yikes, my bad man, didn't see the part about the Ocean week champions taking over. I kinda only skimmed over it briefly haha
